invalidInvitation.title: Your invitation is no longer valid
invalidInvitation.detail: If you wish to become an eDisponent, ask the authorized person to send a new invitation.

foreigner.title: Visit one of our branches
foreigner.detail: Unfortunately, we are unable to onboard you online, but we can do it in person. Visit any of our branches and we can resolve it together. You can find more information in the eDisponent invitation e-mail.

underagePerson.title: We are unable to add you as an eDisponent
underagePerson.detail: Please try again when you are at least 18 years old.

alreadyOnboarded.title: You are an eDisponent already
alreadyOnboarded.detail: If your access is not working, ask the authorized person to activate your access.

initialsNotMatch.title: The data do not match
initialsNotMatch.detail: The verification data does not match the invited person. Ask the person who invited you to check the details on the invitation.

scoring.title: Whoops!
scoring.detail: Unfortunately, we were unable to onboard you online. You can try again, or we can do it together at the branch. Please see the eDisponent invitation email for more information.

contract.title: Whoops!
contract.detail: Unfortunately, we were unable to onboard you online. You can try again, or we can do it together at the branch. Please see the eDisponent invitation email for more information.

contractDisagree.title: Unfortunately, it won't work without consent.
contractDisagree.detail: Do you have any questions? Call us or visit us at the nearest branch.

victory.title: Whoops!
victory.detail: Unfortunately, we were unable to onboard you online. You can try again, or we can do it together at the branch. Please see the eDisponent invitation email for more information.

scoring.title: Hold on a second, we need to check everything
scoring.detail: It will only take a moment

waitingBeforeContract.title: We're getting everything ready for you. Soon, you'll become an eDisponent

contract.title: Read the contract
contract.subtitle: We will send you all documents by email

signByUs.title: Now itâ€™s our turn to sign, please wait a moment.

victoryTexts.title: Done!
victoryTexts.titleLoading: We're getting everything ready for you. Soon, you'll become an eDisponent.
victoryTexts.detail: Your eDisponent access now needs to be approved by an authorized person from the client {0}. After that, you will be able to log into Internet Banka using the ID from the email and the password from the SMS.
victoryTexts.detailStatutory: We have just added you as an authorized representative of the company {0}. You can log into Internet Banka using the ID from the email and the password from the SMS.
